mapper.select: select food_code, food_name, nutr_cont1, nutr_cont2, nutr_cont3, nutr_cont4, nutr_cont5, nutr_cont6, nutr_cont7, nutr_cont8, nutr_cont9, food_maker, food_material, food_image from food

select food_code, food_name, nutr_cont1, nutr_cont2, nutr_cont3, nutr_cont4, nutr_cont5, nutr_cont6, nutr_cont7, nutr_cont8, nutr_cont9, food_maker, food_material, food_image from food where food.food_name LIKE concat('%', #{key}, '%')

select food_code, food_name, nutr_cont1, nutr_cont2, nutr_cont3, nutr_cont4, nutr_cont5, nutr_cont6, nutr_cont7, nutr_cont8, nutr_cont9, food_maker, food_material, food_image from food where food.food_maker LIKE concat('%', #{key}, '%')

select food_code, food_name, nutr_cont1, nutr_cont2, nutr_cont3, nutr_cont4, nutr_cont5, nutr_cont6, nutr_cont7, nutr_cont8, nutr_cont9, food_maker, food_material, food_image from food where food.food_material LIKE concat('%', #{key}, '%')

select food_code, food_name, nutr_cont1, nutr_cont2, nutr_cont3, nutr_cont4, nutr_cont5, nutr_cont6, nutr_cont7, nutr_cont8, nutr_cont9, food_maker, food_material, food_image from food where food.food_allergy LIKE concat('%', #{key}, '%')
